text: Pita-mata yadi tomake amara sathe emana bisayake sarika sthira karate pirapiri kare, yara jnana tomara ne'i; tabe tumi tadera katha manabe na ebam duniyate tadera sathe sadbhabe saha'abasthana karabe. Ye amara abhimukhi haya, tara patha anusarana karabe. Atahpara tomadera pratyabartana amara'i dike ebam tomara ya karate, ami se bisaye tomaderake jnata karabo.
